verses.verse: But <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H1129>building<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853>also<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H3773>beams<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

And it was <S%H5603>covered<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6763>beams,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> lay <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> in a <S%H2905>row.<s%>
And there were <S%H8261>windows<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2905>rows,<s%> and <S%H4237>light<s%> was <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H4237>light<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>ranks.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6607>doors<s%> and <S%H4201>posts<s%> were <S%H7251>square,<s%> with the <S%H8260>windows:<s%> and <S%H4237>light<s%> was <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H4237>light<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>ranks.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H197>porch<s%> of <S%H5982>pillars;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and the <S%H197>porch<s%> was <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them: and the other <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and the thick <S%H5646>beam<s%> were <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them.

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H197>porch<s%> for the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he might <S%H8199>judge,<s%> even the <S%H197>porch<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> and it was <S%H5603>covered<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> from one side of the <S%H4480>floor<s%> <S%H7172><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H7172>other.<s%>

And his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> had <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H1004><s%> the <S%H197>porch,<s%> which <S%H1961>was<s%> of the <S%H2088>like<s%> <S%H4639>work.<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> also a <S%H1004>house<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3947>taken<s%> to wife, like unto <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H197>porch.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were of <S%H3368>costly<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> according to the <S%H4060>measures<s%> of hewed <S%H1496>stones,<s%> <S%H1641>sawed<s%> with <S%H4050>saws,<s%> <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and <S%H4480>without,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> even from the <S%H4480>foundation<s%> <S%H4527><s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H2948>coping,<s%> and so on the <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> <S%H5704>toward<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

And the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> was of <S%H3368>costly<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> even <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>
And <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> were <S%H3368>costly<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> after the <S%H4060>measures<s%> of hewed <S%H1496>stones,<s%> and <S%H730>cedars.<s%>

And the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> was with <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of hewed <S%H1496>stones,<s%> and a <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H3773>beams,<s%> both for the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and for the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> out of <S%H4480>Tyre.<s%> <S%H6865><s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> was a <S%H490>widow's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and his <S%H1>father<s%> was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6876>Tyre,<s%> a <S%H2790>worker<s%> in <S%H5178>brass:<s%> and he was <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> and <S%H1847>cunning<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4399>works<s%> in <S%H5178>brass.<s%> And he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4399>work.<s%>

For he <S%H6696>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> of <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high<s%> <S%H5982>apiece:<s%> <S%H259><s%> and a <S%H2339>line<s%> of <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> did compass either of them <S%H5437>about.<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5982><s%> <S%H8145><s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3805>chapiters<s%> of <S%H3332>molten<s%> <S%H5178>brass,<s%> to <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars:<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3805>chapiter<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3805>chapiter<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%>

And <S%H7638>nets<s%> of <S%H7639>checker<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> and <S%H1434>wreaths<s%> of <S%H8333>chain<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> for the <S%H3805>chapiters<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars;<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3805>chapiter,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3805>chapiter.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7639>network,<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3805>chapiters<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>top,<s%> with <S%H7416>pomegranates:<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3805>chapiter.<s%>

And the <S%H3805>chapiters<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were of <S%H7799>lily<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> in the <S%H197>porch,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And the <S%H3805>chapiters<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> had pomegranates <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> over <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H5980><s%> the <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5676>by<s%> the <S%H7639>network:<s%> and the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> were two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in <S%H2905>rows<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3805>chapiter.<s%>

And he set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> in the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple:<s%> and he set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof <S%H3199>Jachin:<s%> and he set <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof <S%H1162>Boaz.<s%>
And <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> was <S%H7799>lily<s%> <S%H4639>work:<s%> so was the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H8552>finished.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H3332>molten<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> from the one <S%H4480>brim<s%> <S%H8193><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H8193>other:<s%> it was <S%H5696>round<s%> all <S%H5439>about,<s%> and his <S%H6967>height<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and a <S%H6957>line<s%> of <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> did <S%H5437>compass<s%> it round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

And <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H8193>brim<s%> of it round <S%H5439>about<s%> there were <S%H6497>knops<s%> <S%H5437>compassing<s%> it, <S%H6235>ten<s%> in a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> <S%H5362>compassing<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> round <S%H5439>about:<s%> the <S%H6497>knops<s%> were <S%H3332>cast<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2905>rows,<s%> when it was <S%H3333>cast.<s%>

It <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>looking<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>looking<s%> toward the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>looking<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>looking<s%> toward the <S%H4217>east:<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> was set <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> their hinder <S%H268>parts<s%> were <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And it was a <S%H2947>handbreadth<s%> <S%H5672>thick,<s%> and the <S%H8193>brim<s%> thereof was <S%H4639>wrought<s%> like the <S%H8193>brim<s%> of a <S%H3563>cup,<s%> with <S%H6525>flowers<s%> of <S%H7799>lilies:<s%> it <S%H3557>contained<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4350>bases<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4350>base,<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> of it.
And the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H4350>bases<s%> was on <S%H2088>this<s%> manner: they had <S%H4526>borders,<s%> and the <S%H4526>borders<s%> were <S%H996>between<s%> the ledges: <S%H7948><s%>

And <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4526>borders<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7948>ledges<s%> were <S%H738>lions,<s%> <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H3742>cherubims:<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7948>ledges<s%> there was a <S%H3653>base<s%> <S%H4480>above:<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H738>lions<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> were certain <S%H3914>additions<s%> made of <S%H4174>thin<s%> <S%H4639>work.<s%>

And <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H4350>base<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H212>wheels,<s%> and <S%H5633>plates<s%> of <S%H5178>brass:<s%> and the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>corners<s%> thereof had <S%H3802>undersetters:<s%> <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> were <S%H3802>undersetters<s%> <S%H3332>molten,<s%> at the <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> of <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H3914>addition.<s%>

And the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of it <S%H4480>within<s%> <S%H1004><s%> the <S%H3805>chapiter<s%> and <S%H4605>above<s%> was a <S%H520>cubit:<s%> but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> thereof was <S%H5696>round<s%> after the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3653>base,<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half:<s%> <S%H520><s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of it were <S%H4734>gravings<s%> with their <S%H4526>borders,<s%> <S%H7251>foursquare,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5696>round.<s%>

And <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H4526>borders<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H212>wheels;<s%> and the <S%H3027>axletrees<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> were joined to the <S%H4350>base:<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> of <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> was a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H520>cubit.<s%>

And the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> was like the <S%H4639>work<s%> of a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H212>wheel:<s%> their <S%H3027>axletrees,<s%> and their <S%H1354>naves,<s%> and their <S%H2839>felloes,<s%> and their <S%H2840>spokes,<s%> were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3332>molten.<s%>

And there were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3802>undersetters<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4350>base:<s%> and the <S%H3802>undersetters<s%> were <S%H4480>of<s%> the very <S%H4350>base<s%> itself.

And in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H4350>base<s%> was there a <S%H5696>round<s%> <S%H5439>compass<s%> of <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H6967>high:<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H4350>base<s%> the <S%H3027>ledges<s%> thereof and the <S%H4526>borders<s%> thereof were <S%H4480>of<s%> the same.

For <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3871>plates<s%> of the <S%H3027>ledges<s%> thereof, and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4526>borders<s%> thereof, he <S%H6605>graved<s%> <S%H3742>cherubims,<s%> <S%H738>lions,<s%> and palm <S%H8561>trees,<s%> according to the <S%H4626>proportion<s%> of every <S%H376>one,<s%> and <S%H3914>additions<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

After <S%H2063>this<s%> manner he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4350>bases:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4165>casting,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7095>size.<s%>
